thread.title: Ginebra sizzles late to finally get one against Star
thread.title_full: Ginebra sizzles late to finally get one against Star

author: Jane Bracher
title: Ginebra sizzles late to finally get one against Star
text:
Ginebra sizzles late to finally get one against Star Ginebra avoids a 0-3 hole and snaps Star's 8-game winning run since the eliminations Published 9:15   9:15   CRUCIAL WIN. Ginebra finally gets a win against Star to avoid a 0-3 hole in the semifinals. Sol Mercado (C) sizzles for 16 points. Photo by Czeasar Dancel/Rappler 
MANILA, Philippines – Barangay Ginebra San Miguel sizzled from beyond the arc late in the fourth quarter to pull away from the Star Hotshots and record their first win of the best-of-7 semifinals series in Game 3, 73-62, on Monday, February 13. 
The Mall of Asia Arena was sent into a frenzy after the Gin Kings made 3 straight 3-pointers – one from Japeth Aguilar and two courtesy of Sol Mercado, as part of a deciding 14-0 run from the 5:24 mark that gave Ginebra a 73-60 edge with over a minute to go. 
Ginebra finally got one over its rivals after losing two straight to start the 2017 PBA Philippine Cup semis. 
Game 4 of this series is on Wednesday, February 15.
